## Exercises

-   Making a Quarto Document your own:

    - Download  [`csci-summary.qmd`](https://github.com/ryanpeek/cabw2025/blob/main/csci-summary.qmd) (click on {{< fa download >}} )
    - `Render` the document
    - Change the author to your name and change a color in one of the plots, then re-`Render`!
    - Add another plot or table, and re-`Render`!
